Hi!

I am a physics PhD student working in Professor Chakramâ€™s group at Rutgers University. I am interested in developing hardware for quantum computing. I am currently exploring the quantum control of a multimode circuit quantum electrodynamics-based device. I grew up in California and attended the University of California, Berkeley to study physics as an undergraduate.

Papers

Fast Sideband Control of a Weakly Coupled Multimode Bosonic Memory (2025)
Jordan Huang, Thomas J. DiNapoli, Gavin Rockwood, Ming Yuan, Prathyankara Narasimhan, Eesh Gupta, Mustafa Bal, Francesco Crisa, Sabrina Garattoni, Yao Lu, Liang Jiang, and Srivatsan Chakram. arXiv:2503.10623.
